summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1750, for the improvement of the alley in block 34, Pontius' Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, and form East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street, by grading the same on a uniform straight grade between the grades as at present established on East Harrison and East Thomas Street, under Ordinance No. 18587 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
